name: Pappel's Adventure
description:
Pappel is about to have an adventure, with you taking the reigns! Control Pappel in this adventure, don't even worry about controlling yourself at all: Pappel is there for that.

CONTROLS:

E or Right-Click to INTERACT

WASD or Arrows to MOVE

Move Mouse to LOOK

Shift to SPRINT

Spacebar to JUMP

Left-Click for..... you'll see.

Get ready to have an adventure: as Pappel.
